item.name: Watermelon Salad
item.desc: Large juicy red cubes of watermelon with refreshing mint leaves and cottage leaves.

item.name: Yogurt Veggie Salad
item.desc: Very unique taste of regular veggies dressed with curd,flavoured with green chilli ,red chilli and seasonings.

item.name: Jumble Fruit Salad
item.desc: A bowl of garden fresh fruits with a tangy taste of juicy lemon and seasonings.

item.name: Sweet Corn Salad
item.desc: Crunchy bite of fibre rich corn with sweet and creamy texture smothered in melting butter.

item.name: Sprout Veggie Salad
item.desc: Immune boosting and healthy choice of fully grown sprouts and freshly picked veggies topped with pomegranate seeds.

item.name: Russian Salad
item.desc: Mouth Watering of nutrition rich fruits and veggies dressed with cream and honey.

item.name: Soya Paneer Salad
item.desc: Bowl of protein rich chunks of soya added with highly nutritious veggies with a little sour taste of sauces.

item.name: Caesar Salad
item.desc: A wonderful taste of superior veggies full of lettuce iceberg served with Caesar dressing and topped with croutons.

item.name: Extravaganza Veggie Salad
item.desc: A big bowl of natures superior veggies full of broccoli topped with olives,Paneer,cherry tomatoes and sauces.

item.name: Nutri Salad
item.desc: Full of veggies with a sour taste of sugar and vinegar added with drenched dry fruits.

item.name: Mushroom Broccoli Salad
item.desc: A bowl full of stemed Mushroom and broccoli with assorted lettuce iceberg ,superior veggie served with lemon and vinegrette .

item.name: Wheat Pasta Salad
item.desc: Wheat pasta loaded with bellpeppers topped with baby corn cherry tomato black olives and seasonings.

item.name: Delight Sprout Salad
item.desc: Delightful low calorie mix of fully grown sprouts and world's most healthy broccoli combine with drenched dry fruits topped with pomegranate seeds,paneer cubes,cherry tomato.

item.name: Delight Green Salad
item.desc: Full of assorted lettuce ,broccoli other superior veggies drenched with almonds ,cashews ,Kismis topped with black olives ,green olives alepino.

item.name: Delight Fruit Salad
item.desc: Very Lazeez and colorful combi of ripen and exotic fruits loaded with khajoor ,anjeeri ,apricot and dressed with specially made rose petal jam.
